title: productSpecResponse
description: Details of a Product Specification response. These details are used for Serviceability Responses.

objectType.description: The type of the object, productSpecResponse.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Product Specification.
id.title: Unique Identifier

productName.description: The name a product is known by within an organization (e.g., 5Mb Business Ethernet).
productName.title: Product Name

productCode.description: Code that an organization uses for a product in its internal systems that can refer to one or a set of products (e.g., EVCINTER).
productCode.title: Product Code

productType.description: The specific type of product being detailed (e.g. ACCESS_EPL).
productType.title: Product Type

productCategory.description: A high-level categorization of products such as Ethernet.
productCategory.title: Product Category

productFeatures.description: An array of Features of the productSpec.
productFeatures.title: Product Feature
